summary: A freelance journalist named Beth Shelburne emails an unspecified facility to request current staffing levels, citing her work on prison suicides and the Jeffrey Epstein case as context. The document is a brief public records or information request.

persons.name: Beth Shelburne
persons.context: Author of the email, requesting staffing level information from a facility for a story on prison suicides, mentioning the Jeffrey Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned by the journalist as the reason for her inquiry about prison staffing levels in light of his case.

keyFacts: A journalist is investigating prison suicides and links this inquiry to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The journalist is seeking current staffing levels at an unspecified facility.
The request is made via email on August 13, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death in custody.
